import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import GNB from 'routes/_shared/GNB' import { getSearchListApi } from 'services/bookSearchApi' import styles from './bookDetail.module.scss' const BookDetail = () => { const { paramValue } = useParams() // console.log(paramValue) const { data } = useQuery(['getSearchListApi'], () => getSearchListApi(paramValue).then((res) => res.data), { enabled: !!paramValue, }) // console.log(data) return (
{data ? (
  • {data.documents[0].title}
  • 저자
    {data.documents[0].authors}
  • 출판
    {data.documents[0].publisher} | {data.documents[0].datetime}{' '}
  • 판매가
    {data.documents[0].sale_price}
{data.documents[0].contents}...더보기
) : (
sdfds
)}
) } export default BookDetail
